library(teal.modules.general)

custom_header <- tags$div(
  style = "background-color: #f8f9fa; padding: 10px; text-align: center;",
  shiny::tags$h2("Clinical Data Analysis Platform", style = "color: #2c3e50; margin: 0;"),
  shiny::tags$p("Powered by teal framework", style = "color: #7f8c8d; margin: 5px 0 0 0;")
)

app <- teal::init(
  data = teal.data::teal_data(IRIS = iris, MTCARS = mtcars),
  modules = teal::modules(
    teal.modules.general::tm_data_table("Data Table", datanames = "IRIS"),
    teal.modules.general::tm_variable_browser("Variable Browser", datanames = "IRIS", parent_dataname = "IRIS")
  )
) |>
  teal::modify_header(element = custom_header)

if (interactive()) {
  shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
} else {
  shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
}
